scripts.rmrf: rm -rf dist/* && rm -rf docs && npm run rmuploads
scripts.copyfiles: cp -r src/* dist/super-forms/ && cp -r src/docs docs
scripts.delsass: find dist/ -name "*.sass" -type f -delete && find dist/ -name "*.css.map" -type f -delete
scripts.renamelines: npm run delcodes && npm run dellines && sed -i "s:Super Forms - Drag & Drop Form Builder:Super Forms - All In One Bundle:g" dist/super-forms-bundle/super-forms.php
scripts.dev: npm run rmrf && npm run copyfiles && npm run copybundle && npm run deladdons && npm run renamelines && npm run copyaddons
scripts.prod: npm run rmrf && npm run copyfiles && npm run delsass && npm run minifyjs && npm run minifycss && npm run copybundle && npm run deladdons && npm run renamelines && npm run copyaddons && npm run zip
